title: The Echoing Well
description: The town well is talking, and the water is becoming too heavy to lift...

turns.narrative: The town well is 'Echoing' with voices of people who are still alive. They’re talking about their 'Future-Dreams'.
turns.convergence: The well doesn't reflect your face; it reflects a 'Golden-City' that might be. The smell is of mountain-water and old stone.

turns.narrative: A 'Water-Wraith'—a spirit of liquid silver—emerges from the bucket, holding a 'Scroll of the Future'.
turns.convergence: The spirit is a 'Reflection-of-Hope' that has been 'Tainted' by the Scourge's despair.

turns.narrative: The well-water is turning into 'Liquid-Lead'. It’s becoming too heavy to drink and is 'Crushing' the local pipes.
turns.convergence: The water boils and then turns into 'Crystal-Flow'—an eternal, cold supply of pure mana-water.

turns.narrative: The 'Wellminder'—an old man in a blue robe—reveals the well is a 'Fountain of Probability'.
turns.convergence: Every coin tossed in changes the destiny of a single citizen. Choose your toss wisely.

turns.narrative: A 'Gloom-Fish'—a creature of shadow-fins and jagged teeth—lunges from the water, seeking to eat the 'Coins of Destiny'.
turns.convergence: The fish explodes into a thousand 'Silver-Bubbles'. Each bubble contains a happy memory of the town. (+100 XP)

turns.narrative: The Wellminder gives you a 'Well-Bucket of Holding'—it can carry ten tons of water without weighing a pound.
turns.convergence: The bucket is made of oak and bound in 'Mana-Silver'. It’s a 'Legendary-Tool' for settlers.

turns.narrative: The 'Echoing Well' is quiet now, the voices gone. It reflects the sun in a single, brilliant blue eye.
turns.convergence: The townspeople gather to drink the new 'Crystal-Flow'. Their 'Morale' rises to a high point (+20 Morale).

turns.narrative: As you leave, you feel like 'Everything is Possible'. You see a vision of a 'Prosperous-Ridge' in the clouds.
turns.convergence: The vision is a 'Beacon' for the weary. You gain a permanent +2 to 'Charisma'.

turns.narrative: The Wellminder promises to 'Guard the Dreams' of the town. He offers you a 'Well-Token' which entitles you to one 'Re-roll' per week.
turns.convergence: The sun sets, its light hits the well-water in a corona of liquid diamonds.

turns.narrative: Quest ends at the Well. The 'Echoing Well' is a source of hope tonight.

conclusion: The mission regarding 'The Echoing Well' is complete. Quest Complete.

risk_matrix.penalty: The well swallows you and you become an echoing voice of despair. (Quest Failed)
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

unlock_conditions.trigger: Town well begins echoing living voices and water becomes too heavy to lift

permanent_effects.settlement: Well restored; Fountain of Probability catalogued as settlement asset
